description: Simple and fresh, this easy-to-make baked sweet potato salad is perfect for a mid-week dinner.
keywords: Potato salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Salad,Gluten free,Egg free,Spring,Low sugar,Nov 2020,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Baked Sweet Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g sweet potatoes, scrubbed, cut into 3cm rounds
2 tbs baby capers, drained, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Place potato, paprika and half the oil in a large bowl. Season, then toss to combine. Transfer mixture to tray and bake for 25 minutes. Add buckwheat and almonds to tray in the last 5 minutes of cooking, to toast.
Meanwhile, place capers, parsley and remaining oil in a bowl, whisking to combine. Season and set aside.
Arrange potato, spinach, buckwheat and almonds on a platter, tossing to combine. Dollop over yoghurt and serve drizzled with dressing.
